EmailTemplate.name: Order Proactive Communication
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you. We received your order and we are now working to finalize the processing of your request.
Case number: {!Case.CaseNumber}.
Sales order: {!Case.Sales_Order_Number__c}
If you have any questions, please reply to this email.
Honeywell Customer Support http://www.MyAerospace.com
